metadata.description: From the twisted skull-sponge of David Hutchison (Dragon Arms, Oz the Manga)! Prepare yourself for the insanely bizarre antics of two cute little twerps with big heads and even BIGGER weapons as they carve and mutilate their way through non-stop, hilarious misadventure...to HECK! Can these twisted little demons kick the spleen out of the Devil himself? It's hacks and slashes, peppered with gloom and doom, sauteed with Goth-gore galore!
metadata.name: Mischief & Mayhem
